main.java.pds

Class Delivery

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.pds.Stage
      • main.java.pds.Delivery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Updateable

    public class Delivery
extends Stage
implements Updateable, java.io.Serializable
    Delivery is the class representing a single delivery person in the PDS
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        delivery persons can be left in the list of delivery persons; simply iterate through the list checking this boolean
        Returns:
        boolean status representing state of delivery person

        configuration for the delivery object to be updatedable
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be placed in the list of items to be updated with each loop

      • startDelivery

        public void startDelivery(Order orderToDeliver)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        sets the delivery person as busy and delivers the order to the proper location, waiting out the correct amount of time before finishing the order.
        Parameters:
        orderToDeliver - Order object passed in from the delivery queue
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel(OrderItem item)
        Would cancel the items in the order, but cannot cancel a delivery in progress
        Parameters:
        item - - the order item being cancelled.
        Returns:
        true on success.
